greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of row where n occurs in A183079.
comment: A183079 seen as flattened sequence is a permutation of the natural numbers, therefore for each n there exists exactly 1 row in A183079 containing n.
In this sequence each n >= 2 occurs a total of 2^(n-2) times. - _Antti Karttunen_, May 18 2015
link: Reinhard Zumkeller (first 250 terms) & Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10440
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 12 2012
